text: Danish Irfan is a Singaporean footballer currently playing as a defender for Geylang International. He captained the Singapore Under-19 side that participated at the ASEAN Football Federation (AFF) U-19 Championships. == Career statistics == As @ 21 Sept 2019 {| style="text-align:center" class="wikitable" |- ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="2" |S.League ! colspan="2" |Singapore Cup ! colspan="2" |Singapore League Cup ! colspan="2" |Asia ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="3" |Geylang International |2018 |17||0||2||0||0||0||0||0||19||0 |- |2019 |19||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||19||0 |- !Total !36!!0!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!38!!0 |} == International Statistics == === U19 International caps=== {| class="wikitable" !
